jobs.title: Web Designer
jobs.description: Seeking a web designer with experience in UI/UX and responsive design. Must be proficient in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

jobs.title: Front-End Web Developer
jobs.description: Looking for a talented front-end developer with expertise in React and modern JavaScript frameworks. Knowledge of web accessibility standards is a plus.

jobs.title: UI/UX Designer
jobs.description: We are hiring a UI/UX designer to create beautiful and functional interfaces for our clients. Experience with Adobe XD, Sketch, and Figma is required.

jobs.title: Full-Stack Web Developer
jobs.description: Looking for a full-stack web developer proficient in both front-end and back-end development. Knowledge of Node.js and MongoDB is essential.

jobs.title: Senior Web Designer
jobs.description: Seeking an experienced web designer to lead projects and mentor junior designers. Strong background in visual design and experience with design systems.
